author: donschoe
content: just in case that we decide in favor of a tunable genesis time, I would advise to do it soon, even though it's a breaking change

author: alex.vlasov
content:
> Thanks <@!600991921275535360>! Is it known which set of tests are likely to be included in v0.12.1? ðŸ™‚
<@!361447803194441738> don't know
the idea is in theory some clients can implement processing in slightly different way (e.g. drop early messages instead of delaying them). Which is not great from a compatibility point of view. But I believe it's allowed by the specs.
Optional checks is the way to mitigate the problem.
